mapper.update: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `habits` ( `id` INTEGER NOT NULL PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT, `userId` INTEGER, `name` TEXT, `prompt` TEXT, `isBinary` BOOLEAN, `frequency` INTEGER, `metric` TEXT, `metricGoal` REAL )
mapper.select: select * from habits where id = #{id} limit 1
mapper.insert: insert into habits (userId, name, prompt, isBinary, frequency, metric, metricGoal) values (#{userId}, #{name}, #{prompt}, #{isBinary}, #{frequency}, #{metric}, #{metricGoal})
